Uses of Class
nachos.security.Privilege

Packages that use Privilege
nachos.ag Provides classes that can be used to automatically grade Nachos projects. 
nachos.machine Provides classes that implement the Nachos simulated machine. 
nachos.security Provides classes that can be used to protect the host system from malicious Nachos kernels. 
 

Uses of Privilege in nachos.ag
 

Methods in nachos.ag with parameters of type Privilege

          Notify the autograder that a user program executed a syscall instruction was executed.

          Start this autograder.
 void AutoGrader.timerInterrupt(Privilege privilege, long time)
          Notify the autograder that a timer interrupt occurred and was handled by software if a timer interrupt handler was installed.
